attributes.action: Riots to be paid for from UKaid budget
attributes.additional_details: Reparation for the recent riots (Rebuilding, insurance claims, personal compensation, cost of clean up and the cost of the police action) should come from the budget of the Department of International Development. Their budget is 12 BILLION POUNDS of tax payers money that is designated to be given away to foreign countries. Use British tax payer’s money to help the British and stop giving it away to nuclear states like India who have their own aid program! The money required should not be squeezed out of the hard pressed British public when the money is already there.
